snippet: BLITZ--Maria, died on June 11, 2016 at the age of 98. Widow of Abraham "Munio" Blitz. Beloved mother of Leo (Lidewey) and Andrew (Laurie), grandmother of Brian (Yana), Abram and Efrem, great-grandmother of Benjamin and Samuel. She was a survivor of the Krakow Ghetto, Plaszow, Auschwitz, Stutthof, and a death march to, and massacre at, Palmnicken, of which only about 30 of 13,000 survived, and of which she was the last known survivor. She was deeply loved and will be greatly missed. 1/3
